name: Songs from the Public Domain
body:
You can buy the book through Amazon [here](http://www.amazon.com/Songs-Public-Domain-Containing-Protection/dp/1484022807/) or the coil-bound version through Lulu [here](http://www.lulu.com/content/paperback-book/songs-from-the-public-domain/13925666).

You can download the PDF [with](http://bbloomf.github.io/lilypond-songs/PDFs/sftpd.pdf) or [without](http://bbloomf.github.io/lilypond-songs/PDFs/sftpd-playbook.pdf) margins, and the MIDIs are all below.

### MIDIs/PDFs
